sn12.49:1.5: Kismiṃ sati saṅkhārā honti, kismiṃ sati viññāṇaṃ hoti → etthantare pāṭho si, sya-all potthakesu natthi. tathā sati anantarasuttaṭīkāya
sn12.49:2.2: etthantare pāṭho si, sya-all potthakesu natthi. tathā sati anantarasuttaṭīkāya
sn12.49:3.4: Kismiṃ asati saṅkhārā na honti, kismiṃ asati viññāṇaṃ na hoti → etthantare pāṭhopi tattha tatheva
